graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_hall where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Temperature in the STM 312 chamber

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312 where temperature between -1 and 1300 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in the STM 312 chamber

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_volvo where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_volvo where temperature between -1 and 1300 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in the Volvo

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_bifrost where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM heating_data_bifrost where temperature between -1 and 1300 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in Bifrost

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_microreactor where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_microreactor where temperature between -1 and 1300 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in the microreactor

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_microreactor_pirani_buffervolume where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in the microreactor

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_microreactorNG where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_microreactorNG where type = 'T_sample' and value between -1 and 1300 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in the microreactorNG

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_microreactorNG where type = 'P_pirani_buffer' and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_microreactorNG where type = 'P_containment' and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in the microreactor

graph.query: SELECT x,y FROM xy_values_microreactorNG where measurement = 500 order by id
graph.title: Mass Spectrum

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_omicron_ana where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_omicron_nanobeam where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in Omicron Ana.

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_omicron_prep where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_omicron where temperature between -1 and 1300 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Pressure and temperature in Omicron Ana.

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_WPh1 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_WPh2 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_WPh3 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Power drawn from the UPS

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_currentPh1 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_currentPh2 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_currentPh3 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Output current from the UPS

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_voltagePh1 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_voltagePh2 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_voltagePh3 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Output voltage from the UPS

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_kVAPh1 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_kVAPh2 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_kVAPh3 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: kVA from the UPS

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_voltage1NormalInput where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_voltage2NormalInput where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_voltage3NormalInput where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Input voltage to the UPS

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_frequencyNormalInput where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM ups_batteryTemperatureLevel where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Net freqency and battery temperature

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25) FROM gasmonitor_ch01 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25) + 4.2 FROM gasmonitor_ch02 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25) - 5 FROM gasmonitor_ch03 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query3: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25) - 9.5 FROM gasmonitor_ch04 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Output voltage from the UPS

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25)+6 FROM gasmonitor_ch09 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25)+5 FROM gasmonitor_ch11 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), (6.25*value - 25) +3 FROM gasmonitor_ch13 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Output voltage from the UPS

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), 15.625*(value -4) + 0.5 FROM gasmonitor_ch05 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), 15.625*(value -4) + 1.6 FROM gasmonitor_ch06 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), 15.625*(value -4) +0.8 FROM gasmonitor_ch07 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Output voltage from the UPS

graph.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), 15.625*(value -4) +1.1 FROM gasmonitor_ch08 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query1: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), 15.625*(value -4) +0.8 FROM gasmonitor_ch10 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.query2: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), 15.625*(value -4) -1.1 FROM gasmonitor_ch12 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
graph.title: Output voltage from the UPS
